alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Marion; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 15 at 3:55PM CDT until April 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arkansas, including the following areas, Baxter, Boone County Except Southwest, Boone County Higher Elevations, Marion and Stone. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT this evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Marion; Stone
